title: Pierre Cahuzac
text:
Pierre Cahuzac (3 July 1927 – 31 August 2003) was a French <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. After retiring he became a manager, and led <a href="SC%20Bastia">SC Bastia</a> to the <a href="1978%20UEFA%20Cup%20Final">1978 UEFA Cup Final</a>.
His grandson <a href="Yannick%20Cahuzac">Yannick Cahuzac</a> is a professional footballer.
